name: NFCNDEFReaderSessionDelegate
desc: A protocol that an object implements to serve as an NDEF reader session delegate.

items.name: func readerSessionDidBecomeActive(NFCNDEFReaderSession)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the reader session is active.

items.name: func readerSession(NFCNDEFReaderSession, didDetectNDEFs: [NFCNDEFMessage])
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the session detected NFC tags with NDEF messages.

items.name: func readerSession(NFCNDEFReaderSession, didDetect: [NFCNDEFTag])
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the session detected NFC tags with NDEF messages and enables read-write capability for the session.

items.name: func readerSession(NFCNDEFReaderSession, didInvalidateWithError: Error)
items.desc: Tells the delegate the reason for invalidating a reader session.
